org.asoem.greyfish.core.traits

Class HeritableTrait<A extends Agent<?>,T,C extends AgentContext<A>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.asoem.greyfish.core.properties.AbstractAgentProperty<C,T>
      • org.asoem.greyfish.core.traits.AbstractAgentTrait<C,T>
        • org.asoem.greyfish.core.traits.HeritableTrait<A,T,C>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - the type of the enclosing Agent
    T - the type of the value of this trait
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, AgentComponent<C>, AgentNode, AgentProperty<C,T>, AgentTrait<C,T>, org.asoem.greyfish.utils.collect.TreeNode<AgentNode>

    public class HeritableTrait<A extends Agent<?>,T,C extends AgentContext<A>>
extends AbstractAgentTrait<C,T>
implements AgentTrait<C,T>
    A generic heritable trait which holds an arbitrary value of type T. Initialization, mutation and segregation of this value are defined using Callbacks.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
